Alphabet enters $3 trillion market cap club as Big Tech's AI momentum builds

2025-09-15 14:07:19+00:00
  • Class A shares of the company were up 3.8% at $250, while Class C shares climbed 3.7% to $250.4 - both trading at record highs.
  • In July, the company's cloud-computing unit delivered an almost 32% jump in second quarter revenue, surpassing expectations as investments in in-house chips and the Gemini AI model began to pay off.
  • Including Monday's gains, the company's shares have rallied more than 32% so far this year, the best performer among the so-called "Magnificent 7" stocks and outpacing the 12.5% gain for the S&P 500.
  • Kim Forrest, chief investment officer at Bokeh Capital Partners, said tech stocks have been the leaders of the recent rally and "there has been no other (sector) in the past 18 months, maybe even two years that has had s
  • Alphabet joined other tech giants Apple and Microsoft in hitting a $3 trillion valuation, while AI chipmaker Nvidia, the world's most valuable company, boasts a market cap of $4.25 trillion.

2025-09-15 16:18:10+00:00

  • Other members include leader, Nvidia , which is valued at more than $4.2tr (€3.57tr), followed by Microsoft with an approximate $3.8tr (€3.23tr) market cap and Apple, worth $3.5tr (€3tr).
  • Google's search business accounts for more than half of the company's revenue.

Google Parent Alphabet's Market Cap Hits $3 Trillion for First Time

2025-09-15 15:19:36+00:00
  • Its shares rose more than 4% on Monday, closing at a record high near $252.
  • The move pushed Alphabet’s ( GOOGL ) market capitalization above $3 trillion, making it the fourth company to do so.
  • With Monday's gains, Alphabet's stock has added roughly a third of its value this year, making it the best-performing member of the Magnificent Seven for 2025 so far.
  • Matthias Balk / picture alliance / Getty Images Alphabet's stock has added roughly a third of its value in 2025 so far Google parent Alphabet’s market value reached a major milestone today.
  • The only others to have reached that level are Apple ( AAPL ), Microsoft ( MSFT ), and AI darling Nvidia ( NVDA ), the latter which earlier this year became the first company to top $4 trillion .

  • Shares jumped more than 4% to record highs, lifting both of Alphabet’s publicly traded classes into the three-comma club.
  • The company also signaled it would spend more aggressively to meet data-center demand, boosting its 2025 capital expenditures plan by $10 billion to $85 billion.
  • Google’s move to $3 trillion also comes as Google Cloud is finally throwing its weight around.
  • The $3 trillion club is still tiny, but the message is loud: scale, distribution, and power-hungry infrastructure are monetizing AI faster than skeptics expected.

Filtering Bitcoin is authoritarian

2025-09-09 12:05:57+00:00
  • The Great Bitcoin Filter Debate of 2025 rages on, and it’s getting pretty brutal.
  • Despite 100% of users filtering transactions with extremely low fee rates, those transactions were still being mined in over half of the blocks.
  • In other words, even with 100% filtering we still see the iron laws of economics prevail: if there’s a paying customer, someone will cash the check.
  • One Bitcoin developer who goes by the online pseudonym “PortlandHODL” demonstrates that the number is upwards of 98% of all nodes to impose a modest cost.
  • Also called Bitcoin-NFTs, backlash against these Ordinals grew rapidly from there appearance in 2023 and a growing sect of Bitcoiners have advocated for “filtering” these Bitcoin transactions out of the blockchain.

2025-09-08 05:30:00+00:00
  • As of June 30, 2025, Apollo had approximately $840 billion of assets under management.
  • Since 2020, Apollo has originated more than $100 billion of bespoke, high-grade solutions, including for European companies and/or European assets such as EDF, BP, Vonovia, Air France-KLM, AB InBev and Intel’s Fab 34 in
  • The JV will provide the required equity capital for its 25.1% stake to support Amprion’s major investment program for grid expansion over the next decade, enhancing critical German energy infrastructure.
  • The JV will be operationally controlled by RWE and hold and fund RWE’s 25.1% stake in Amprion, a Transmission System Operator (TSO) spanning across seven German federal states and serving approximately 29 million people
  • The transaction is subject to regulatory approvals and customary closing conditions, and it is expected to close in the fourth quarter of 2025.

2025-09-08 18:29:53+00:00

  • The massive 32% increase is now one of the highest price targets on Wall Street, with the current Street-high price target of $416.
  • Citi analyst Atif Malik said the lowered price target reflects a 4% cut to next year's Nvidia revenue estimates.
  • The move was all the more notable since the stock rallied 9.4% last Friday, following last Thursday's earnings release.
  • Malik now sees a total $12 billion worth of Nvidia GPU revenue going to OpenAI's internal chip effort in collaboration with Broadcom.

2025-09-08 15:19:00+00:00
  • This program will be available in fall 2025, specifically to ultra-high-net-worth (UHNW) clients with a net worth of $50 million or more.
  • According to a Bank of America Private Bank study in 2024, 93% of the young HNW investors plan to increase their allocation to alternatives in the coming years.
  • Additionally, BAC launched Premium Access Strategies in 2022, a dual contract investment advisory program to cater to UHNW clients, which has grown to more than $60 billion in client assets in just three years.

BlackRock Survey Reveals Record Retirement Confidence Gap Between Employees and their Employers

2025-09-08 11:00:00+00:00
  • 50% prefer to have their investments managed for them, up from 36% in 2017.
  • 86% of workplace savers now want it - a steady rise from 80% in 2019 - and 74% would save more if their plan had an option for it.
  • Today’s retirees agree: 91% wish they had access to a solution like a target-date fund, an increase from 84% in 2020.
  • Economic uncertainty has contributed to a decline in savings rates this year—dipping to a median 10% in 2025, from 12% in 2022.
  • While confidence has risen 22% across both groups since 2016, closing the gap remains critical, especially given women’s longer lifespans.

Press Release Biocartis NV: Biocartis Receives FDA Approval for the Idylla™ CDx MSI Test

2025-09-15 13:00:00+00:00
  • PRESS RELEASE - 09/15/2025, 09:00 AM EDT Biocartis Receives FDA Approval for the Idylla™ CDx MSI Test First-ever fully automated, sample-to-result, cartridge-based companion diagnostic test approved in the US for colorec
  • The Idylla™ CDx MSI Test aids in identifying eligible microsatellite instability-high (MSI-H) colorectal cancer (CRC) patients, who may benefit from treatment with OPDIVO® (nivolumab) alone, or in combination with YERVOY
  • The Test runs in a single-use cartridge, requiring less than three minutes of hands-on-time and delivering straightforward results in under three hours.
  • “Achieving FDA approval for our Idylla™ CDx MSI Test represents a key milestone for Biocartis," said Michael Korn, M.D., Chief Medical and Scientific Officer at Biocartis.
  • With its speed, accuracy, and automation, the Idylla™ CDx MSI Test offers a powerful solution that enables clinicians to make timely, confident and data-driven treatment decisions when every moment counts.”

  • Of the 23 recommendations that derive the current ABR, 12 are Strong Buy, representing 52.2% of all recommendations.
  • It is displayed in whole numbers -- 1 to 5.
  • An ABR of 1.99 approximates between Strong Buy and Buy.
  • Broker recommendations are the sole basis for calculating the ABR, which is typically displayed in decimals (such as 1.28).
  • Do you wonder why?

2025-09-15 12:00:27+00:00
  • And it impressed us with free cash flow of US$1.6b, being 95% of its EBIT.
  • As you can see below, at the end of June 2025, Cadence Design Systems had US$2.48b of debt, up from US$1.35b a year ago.
  • So its liabilities outweigh the sum of its cash and (near-term) receivables by US$747.4m.
  • However, its balance sheet shows it holds US$3.00b in cash, so it actually has US$522.8m net cash.
  • Offsetting this, it had US$3.00b in cash and US$753.8m in receivables that were due within 12 months.

Analyst Report: CF Industries Holdings, Inc.

2025-09-08 17:20:44+00:00
  • The company operates nitrogen manufacturing plants primarily in North America.
  • CF Industries is a leading producer and distributor of nitrogen, which is primarily used in fertilizers.
  • CF also produces nitrogen in the United Kingdom and holds a joint venture interest in a nitrogen production facility in Trinidad and Tobago.
  • CF makes nitrogen primarily using low-cost US natural gas as its feedstock, making the company one of the lowest-cost nitrogen producers globally.
  • It is also investing in carbon-free blue and green ammonia, which can be used as an alternative fuel to hydrogen or as a means to transport hydrogen.

Charter Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ:CHTR) Delivered A Better ROE Than Its Industry

2025-09-08 11:00:11+00:00
  • The formula for ROE is: Return on Equity = Net Profit (from continuing operations) ÷ Shareholders' Equity So, based on the above formula, the ROE for Charter Communications is: 30% = US$6.1b ÷ US$20b (Based on the traili
  • So, this means that for every $1 of its shareholder's investments, the company generates a profit of $0.30.
  • As is clear from the image below, Charter Communications has a better ROE than the average (12%) in the Media industry.
  • Charter Communications' Debt And Its 30% ROE It seems that Charter Communications uses a huge volume of debt to fund the business, since it has an extremely high debt to equity ratio of 4.73.
  • (NASDAQ:CHTR).

  • Strong Buy and Buy respectively account for 72.6% and 3.9% of all recommendations.
  • It is displayed in whole numbers -- 1 to 5.
  • An ABR of 1.55 approximates between Strong Buy and Buy.
  • Of the 51 recommendations that derive the current ABR, 37 are Strong Buy and two are Buy.
  • Broker recommendations are the sole basis for calculating the ABR, which is typically displayed in decimals (such as 1.28).

  • Broker recommendations are the sole basis for calculating the ABR, which is typically displayed in decimals (such as 1.28).

Why CVS Health (CVS) Stock Is Falling Today

2025-09-08 19:36:47+00:00
  • CVS Health is up 57.9% since the beginning of the year, and at $69.81 per share, it is trading close to its 52-week high of $74.09 from September 2025.
  • What Is The Market Telling Us CVS Health’s shares are somewhat volatile and have had 13 moves greater than 5% over the last year.

  • According to the International Energy Agency, adoption of AI across the buildings sector alone could save up to 300-terawatt-hours (TWh) of energy annually.
  • Xendee’s solution is hardware agnostic, allowing DER operators to seamlessly manage over 27 different types of technologies, including solar, battery energy storage systems, nuclear, linear generators, and combined heat
  • Together, the companies will provide customers a streamlined path to design, deploy and operate highly efficient, resilient microgrids and DERs.
  • The solution will unlock real-time operational adjustments for microgrid systems that help lead to significant cost savings, enhanced resilience, reduced emissions and extended equipment lifespans.

  • Most AI labs already have some version of the internal safety policy that SB 53 requires.
  • Despite the criticism, policy experts say SB 53 is a more modest approach than previous AI safety bills.
  • SB 53 aims to set these requirements as state law, with financial repercussions if an AI lab fails to comply.
  • Governor Gavin Newsom has stayed silent on the bill so far, although he vetoed Senator Weiner’s last AI safety bill, SB 1047.
Original Read

The Trend Of High Returns At Hilton Worldwide Holdings (NYSE:HLT) Has Us Very Interested

2025-09-15 12:00:30+00:00
  • Thus, Hilton Worldwide Holdings has an ROCE of 21%.
  • We found that the returns on capital employed over the last five years have risen by 348%.
  • That's a fantastic return and not only that, it outpaces the average of 10% earned by companies in a similar industry.
  • Essentially the business now has suppliers or short-term creditors funding about 29% of its operations, which isn't ideal.
  • To calculate this metric for Hilton Worldwide Holdings, this is the formula: Return on Capital Employed = Earnings Before Interest and Tax (EBIT) ÷ (Total Assets - Current Liabilities) 0.21 = US$2.4b ÷ (US$16b - US$4.6b)

A Closer Look At Honeywell International Inc.'s (NASDAQ:HON) Impressive ROE

2025-09-15 11:00:23+00:00
  • Return on equity can be calculated by using the formula: Return on Equity = Net Profit (from continuing operations) ÷ Shareholders' Equity So, based on the above formula, the ROE for Honeywell International is: 34% = US$
  • Pleasingly, Honeywell International has a superior ROE than the average (20%) in the Industrials industry.
  • One way to conceptualize this is that for each $1 of shareholders' capital it has, the company made $0.34 in profit.
  • The 'return' is the yearly profit.
  • Our risks dashboardshould have the 2 risks we have identified for Honeywell International.

2025-09-15 13:11:39+00:00
  • Also Read: Intel Growth Challenges Are Not Over Despite Altera Stake Sale: Analyst In the first half of 2025, Altera generated $816 million in revenue with a 55% gross margin and $356 million in operating expenses.
  • Under the agreement, Silver Lake acquired 51% of Altera for about $3.3 billion, while Intel retained a 49% interest.
  • The agreement also provides Washington with a five-year warrant to purchase an additional 5% stake at $20 per share should Intel’s ownership in the foundry fall below 51%.
  • Intel reported GAAP operating expenses of about $21.9 billion for 2025 and expects $19 billion in 2026.
  • In August, Intel confirmed that the Trump administration had converted CHIPS Act grants into a $5.7 billion equity stake, giving the government 10% ownership and greater influence over the chipmaker’s strategy.

Can IQVIA Holdings Inc.'s (NYSE:IQV) ROE Continue To Surpass The Industry Average?

2025-09-08 12:00:11+00:00
  • Return on equity can be calculated by using the formula: Return on Equity = Net Profit (from continuing operations) ÷ Shareholders' Equity So, based on the above formula, the ROE for IQVIA Holdings is: 21% = US$1.2b ÷ US
  • One way to conceptualize this is that for each $1 of shareholders' capital it has, the company made $0.21 in profit.
  • As is clear from the image below, IQVIA Holdings has a better ROE than the average (11%) in the Life Sciences industry.
  • IQVIA Holdings' Debt And Its 21% ROE IQVIA Holdings clearly uses a high amount of debt to boost returns, as it has a debt to equity ratio of 2.68.
  • That's clearly a positive.

  • The formula for return on equity is: Return on Equity = Net Profit (from continuing operations) ÷ Shareholders' Equity So, based on the above formula, the ROE for Keurig Dr Pepper is: 6.1% = US$1.5b ÷ US$25b (Based on th
  • With its stock down 22% over the past month, it is easy to disregard Keurig Dr Pepper (NASDAQ:KDP).
  • That means that for every $1 worth of shareholders' equity, the company generated $0.06 in profit.
  • Thus, the low net income growth of 4.3% seen by Keurig Dr Pepper over the past five years could probably be the result of the low ROE.
  • We then compared the company's ROE to the broader industry and were disappointed to see that the ROE is lower than the industry average of 21%.

Daily Spotlight: Bond Spreads Still Tight

2025-09-15 11:08:00+00:00
  • public companies reached a post-global financial crisis high of 9.2% at the end of 2024 and is predicted to remain elevated throughout 2025.
  • For example, the spread between AAA-rated corporate bonds and 10-year government bonds in August was 109 basis points (bps), down from 114 bps in May but still lower than the historical average of 122 bps.
  • We watch these spreads closely for several reasons.
  • The gap between the government 10-year bond yield and a BAA-rated bond (still investment grade) in August was 174 basis points, below the historical average spread of 228 bps but narrower by about 15 bps since the spring
  • Corporate bond yields have headed lower as well, and at a faster rate than Treasury yields.

  • Kim Forrest, chief investment officer at Bokeh Capital Partners, said tech stocks have been the leaders of the recent rally and "there has been no other (sector) in the past 18 months, maybe even two years that has had s
  • Alphabet joined other tech giants Apple and Microsoft in hitting a $3 trillion valuation, while AI chipmaker Nvidia , the world's most valuable company, boasts a market cap of $4.25 trillion.

Strategy pauses MSTR ATM for the first time since revising guidance

2025-09-15 13:31:23+00:00
  • Read More: Strategy hikes STRC dividend to 10%, declares September payouts for all preferred series At time of publication, MSTR is down 0.4% from Friday’s close.
  • In total, from the August 18 guidance change through September 7, Strategy sold 2,703,907 MSTR shares for approximately $935.7 million in net proceeds before halting common-stock issuance in the most recent week.
  • The 8-K filing shows zero MSTR shares sold during the period, with $16.11 billion of capacity remaining under the $21 billion common stock ATM.
  • For September 2–7, Strategy sold a further 591,606 MSTR shares for $200.5 million and purchased 1,955 BTC for $217.4 million at an average price of $111,196.
  • Between August 18–24, it sold 875,301 MSTR shares for $309.9 million in net proceeds and acquired 3,081 BTC for $356.9 million at an average price of $115,829.

  • But what if that was the bottom of a secret, “rolling” recession in place for nearly three years, dating back to 2022?

  • To further insulate margins, NCLH has hedged roughly 65% of 2025, 48% of 2026 and 22% of 2027 projected fuel purchases.

Calculating The Intrinsic Value Of Republic Services, Inc. (NYSE:RSG)

2025-09-08 11:00:16+00:00
  • A DCF is all about the idea that a dollar in the future is less valuable than a dollar today, and so the sum of these future cash flows is then discounted to today's value: 10-year free cash flow (FCF) forecast 2026 2027
  • In this calculation we've used 7.2%, which is based on a levered beta of 0.881.
  • We discount the terminal cash flows to today's value at a cost of equity of 7.2%.
  • Compared to the current share price of US$230, the company appears about fair value at a 12% discount to where the stock price trades currently.
  • Present Value of Terminal Value (PVTV)= TV / (1 + r)10= US$114b÷ ( 1 + 7.2%)10= US$57b The total value is the sum of cash flows for the next ten years plus the discounted terminal value, which results in the Total Equity

S&P Warns of Reinsurer Protections as Catastrophe Risks Escalate

2025-09-08 08:03:47+00:00
  • The reinsurance industry covered just over 10% of total insured catastrophe losses last year, compared with about 25% in 2019 and well below the historical average of 20%, according to S&P.
  • This year, natural catastrophes are set to drive insured losses past $150 billion, which is well above the 10-year-average, according to risk modeler Verisk.
  • Big reinsurers now have enough capital to handle insured losses equivalent to three Hurricane Katrinas in a single year, or roughly $300 billion, while maintaining their existing credit ratings, according to S&P.
  • “That is remarkable,” Ashworth said.
  • “I don’t expect the pendulum to swing back anytime soon,” he said in an interview.

SpaceX strikes $17B deal to buy EchoStar’s spectrum for Starlink’s direct-to-phone service

2025-09-08 13:26:57+00:00
  • On August 26, EchoStar sold $23 billion worth of spectrum licenses to AT&T.
  • Of the cash, $2 billion will be made as direct cash interest payments on debt held by EchoStar.
  • EchoStar will sell its AWS-4 and H-block spectrum licenses in exchange for $8.5 billion in cash and $8.5 billion in SpaceX stock.
  • As part of the move, EchoStar simultaneously canceled a $1.3 billion contract with Canadian satellite maker MDA Space that was announced just five weeks earlier in August for 100 satellites.
  • SpaceX said Monday that the new spectrum will enable upgraded satellites with “more than 100 times” the capacity of first-generation Starlink direct-to-cell satellites.

Texas Instruments Incorporated's (NASDAQ:TXN) Intrinsic Value Is Potentially 25% Below Its Share Price

2025-09-08 11:00:19+00:00
  • A DCF is all about the idea that a dollar in the future is less valuable than a dollar today, so we need to discount the sum of these future cash flows to arrive at a present value estimate: 10-year free cash flow (FCF)
  • In this calculation we've used 10%, which is based on a levered beta of 1.561.
  • Dividend is low compared to the top 25% of dividend payers in the Semiconductor market.
  • Present Value of Terminal Value (PVTV)= TV / (1 + r)10= US$186b÷ ( 1 + 10%)10= US$70b The total value, or equity value, is then the sum of the present value of the future cash flows, which in this case is US$129b.
  • In this case we have used the 5-year average of the 10-year government bond yield (3.1%) to estimate future growth.

  • What’s Really at Stake Tokenized equities are blockchain-based tokens designed to track the price movements of real stocks.

  • Of the 26 recommendations that derive the current ABR, 15 are Strong Buy and two are Buy.
  • Broker recommendations are the sole basis for calculating the ABR, which is typically displayed in decimals (such as 1.28).

Zoetis Gains CVMP Backing for Portela, Eyes EU Approval in Cat OA Pain

2025-09-15 13:52:00+00:00
  • ZTS shares have lost 9.1% year to date compared with the industry’s 10.9% growth.
  • OA is a progressive joint disease that causes pain and mobility issues in cats, with up to 40% showing clinical signs, though only 18% are formally diagnosed.
  • Subject to a favorable outcome, the company anticipates making Portela commercially available in the EU in 2026.
  • Based on the CVMP’s recommendation, Zoetis expects the European regulatory body to communicate a final decision during the fourth quarter of 2025.
